short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sprunki-infected is a game of the Incredibox Sprunki genre.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the infectious rhythm of Sprunki music creation with this unique Incredibox-style game! Create catchy beats and melodies by combining different sound elements in the beloved Sprunki style. Mix and match various audio samples to compose your own original tracks, experiment with different combinations, and discover hidden musical patterns.
Whether you're a fan of Incredibox or new to music creation games, sprunki-infected offers an intuitive and entertaining way to make music. Layer different sounds, unlock special combinations, and share your musical creations with others. Perfect for both casual players and music enthusiasts who enjoy creative, rhythm-based gameplay.
Features:

Simple drag-and-drop interface for music creation
Multiple sound samples in the Sprunki style
Special combinations to discover
Save and share your musical creations
No musical experience required
